title: Neurodivergent Social Maintenance
description: A social connection routine designed for ADHD and autistic individuals. Uses energy management, low-pressure approaches, and neurodivergent-friendly communication strategies to maintain friendships and social connections without overwhelm.

setupSteps.question: What's your biggest social challenge? (initiating contact, maintaining friendships, social energy management, or all of the above)
What time of day do you have the most social energy?
How many close friends do you want to maintain regular contact with? (Start small - 2-3 is perfect!)
What's your preferred way to connect with friends? (text, call, video chat, in-person, or a mix)
What helps you recharge after social interactions? (alone time, specific activity, sensory tool, etc.)
